com.epimorphics.lda.cache
Class ControllerBase

java.lang.Object
  com.epimorphics.lda.cache.ControllerBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cache.Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
LimitEntriesController, LimitTriplesController, PermaController
public class ControllerBase
extends Object
implements Cache.Controller

A Cache.Controller base class that is passed an actual cache factory on construction.
